reviewText: Though this movie is NTSC/Region 1, it is in french and there are no subtitles. The company who produced the DVD(Alliance/Vivafilm) is Canadien, which could explain this phenomena

Do not get this movie if you don't understand French.  There aren't any English subtitles.

The movie is about the trials and tribulations of a funeral director.  It's a comedy, but without an understanding of French, you probably won't find it very funny.  It didn't make a big impression on me.
